segments.text: How much will it be all together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you can't , ma'am . We accept only traveler's checks and credit cards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . How about this card then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can take it . Just a moment ... Please sign here .
segments.speaker: S2
